name: Web Development
descrip: Something about common topics in web development courses.

topics.arg: Most web development courses include a component on HTML. A major part of HTML is its structure. It is this same structure that is leveraged by screen readers to enable blind or low-vision people to interact with the web. Thus, this is a good place to introduce the concept of accessibility.

It's important to define accessibility to your students because they may not have seen it before and knowing about it is becoming a requirement in modern web development. Etc etc (argument for topic i.e. group of LOs)

It's important to define accessibility to your students because they may not have seen it before and knowing about it is becoming a requirement in modern web development. Etc etc (argument for topic i.e. group of LOs)
Given how user-facing mobile applications are, it makes sense to discuss their accessibility.
This topic highlights different ways to introduce the concept of accessibility to students. Different subtopics may have different weight or usefulness depending how much time you may have available.

Vision’s main connection to accessibility is in its applications to accessibility problems.

NLP’s main connection to accessibility is in its applications to accessibility problems.
Accessibility is a topic in its own right when it comes to human-computer interaction, but two main points of connection lie in interfaces and how people use them, and universal design methods.
There is an entire subfield of robotics devoted to accessibility, namely assistive robotics.
